review.comment: Very disappointing service received from your associates and I Waited more than 5 months to get a solar tube replaced in my solar hot water system and also there were sleeves to be changed even though I paid Rs 6000 it wasn’t done properly it’s still leaking.I was given a number by so called Asiri to call to call one of his colleague Pradeep he never answered or dropped a message even so I tried to contact him many more times.there is a person called manoj who was never cooperative and never heard about customer service.
review.review_reply:
We were so sorry to hear about the negative experience you had with our technical service team. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the stress and frustration this has caused you. It wasn’t our intention to disappoint you. But we feel fully responsible for what happened and for any inconvenience, this may have caused you.

After we looked into the situation, we found the oversight resulted from delays in the technical service division due to the crisis situation in the country. Fuel crisis adversely impacted all our service and maintenance operations. But we are not taking this as an excuse, and we regret that this error slipped past our quality processes. We’ve taken steps to prevent it from happening again.

However, as per our records we received your first complaint on 7th of July and our technical team visited your place on 14th of July. After your second complaint on 2nd of August regarding the water leak, our team attended to your complaint on 4th of August. We believe that the issue is resolved by now. As a token of our apology, we have offered a 10% discount on all spare parts for your service repair.

We value your business and hope we will never put you in this situation. If you still have further questions about the incident, please do not hesitate to reach out. We’d be happy to talk through them with you.

Thank You

review.comment: Maintenance support nill.disgusting.i tried many times to maintain the tank that there was a leak.but they did not cooperate.
In year 2016 most reasonable price in Sri Lanka
when choosing a solar provider go with the party that you can trust to honour their 25yr warranty
